Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Ohio
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Roosevelt and Midway
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and Midway due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and Midway due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Roosevelt and the Loop at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
